headline: A Closer Look at Earnings Expectations for Q1 & Full-Year 2025
summary: The March-quarter earnings season will really get underway once the big banks start reporting results, though we've already seen quarterly results from a few companies, including Adobe and Oracle.

headline: Adobe Expands AI Model Partnerships
summary: David Wadhwani, president of Adobe's Digital Media Business, says the company's new AI products will allow it to deliver most free and paid tier options for users. He joins Caroline Hyde and Tim Stenovec on "Bloomberg Technology."

headline: Adobe Launches New AI Products. CFO Wants Revenue to Be 100% Gen AI Influenced.
summary: The stock has dropped 12% this year as investors wait for signs Adobe is monetizing its AI offerings.

headline: Adobe (NasdaqGS:ADBE) Enhances AI Solutions And Partnerships With Microsoft And Amazon
summary: Despite several product and strategic partnership announcements on March 18, 2025, Adobe (NasdaqGS:ADBE) experienced a 9.75% price decline over the last week. This downturn occurred amid a relatively flat market, reflecting broader market uncertainties and investor caution. Key developments, such as the integration with Amazon Web Services and AI-powered updates across Adobe Firefly and Experience Platform, poised Adobe for future growth in customer engagement and marketing services. However,...

headline: Adobe: Generative Credits Capped And The Path To AI Monetization Finally Becomes Clear
summary: ADBE had a strong Q1 with revenue and EPS beats, but the stock fell nearly 14% due to conservative guidance.
